name: Super Off-Road
blurb: "Split second off-road racing through stunning environments, with jumps, drifting and power-ups. For PC, MacOS, Ipad/iphone & Android"

rewards.reward: Our heartfelt thanks to everyone that pledges, no matter how small it will all be put to good use. You will also receive a free copy of our title Switch on either Android, PC or iOS.

You will receive the mobile version of the game on the following mobile formats: iPhone, iPad, Android Phone & Tablet, Blackberry Playbook & BB10 Phone. You will also receive a mention in the mobile backers section of the games credits.

Get your choice of either iOS, Android, BB10 or PC/Mac version of the game. You will also receive a free copy of Bang Bang Racing and be featured in our kickstarter credits. We will keep you regularly up to date on our progress with early video's and artwork.

Lower tier rewards along with a special digital piece of artwork exclusive to you, you will also receive a free copy of our latest game House Of Golf on either iOS, Android, PC or Mac and you'll also receive every game we develop for the next 2 years for free.
Lower tier rewards and you will also receive a fantastic Zeemote (worth $29.99) that can be used with many great Android and PC games including Super Off Road.

Lower tier rewards along with an exclusive Super Off-Road T-Shirt designed by the amazing people at Insert Coin Clothing and your name will be featured in our special Kickstarter "Racing Angels" thank you section of the game.
Lower tier rewards along with an awesome Super Off-Road Hoodie again designed by the awesome guys at Insert Coin Clothing.

Lower tier rewards and access to our exclusive "club off road" beta test were you will receive early builds of the game and be able to give us feedback and help test the game.  You'll also get a limited edition print of one of the concept images from the game numbered and signed by the artist and you will be credited as a team member in the testing section.

Lower Tier Rewards and you will also receive a personalized limited edition "signed by the team" photobook detailing the development of the game and a limited edition Super Off-Road USB Stick filled with goodies.

Lower tier rewards and we will also turn your name into a logo which will be featured in the game either on a vehicle or around the track, you will also receive a high quality digital image of your logo for your own personal use.

As well as the above rewards we will also name one of the tracks/cars or events after you glorifying your donation for all of time, or until the sun engulfs the earth in about 5600 million years time.

Lower tier rewards and you will work with one of our artists to design one of the car skins in the game. You will also receive a very exclusive Samsung Galaxy Tab2 10.1 or Ipad Tablet painted with a vehicle featuring your design on the back of the tablet.

As well as all the above rewards you will also have the chance to have your own car featured as one of the games vehicles. We will model your car, pimp it up for the game and name it after you. You will also receive some exclusive images of the car for your own personal use.
As well as all the above rewards you can come to our studio and spend a week working with us on the game and be credited as Associate Producer in the title. (Flight not included)
